entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 2:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon except a few flurries over higher terrain. Local snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
